title: grahangaLim
sahitya:
grahangaLin anugraha balam irundhAl nalamelAm perugumE shruti paravum


anupallavi

  jagangaLai ALum arashargaLaiyum dEvEndranaiyum ATTivaikkum nava


caraNam    Adavan mati angArakan budhan guru shukran shani araviraNDu
mAdhavan pashupatiyum pOTrumivar nAmam uraittAlE piNigaL aghalum shrI
